name: DimensionalDrift
description:
THE PLAYER HAS NO IDEA OF WHAT’S IN FRONT OH HIM, HE CANNOT SEE ANYTHING CLEARLY AS THE SCENE IS SET IN A DARK DIMENSION Rules
  •  In-order to survive in this dimension you have to fight with the weapon provided by this dimension. To get access the weapon you have to right click on the mouse to equip the gun and use left click to fire.
  • Every time when you equip the weapon you get 3 Bullets. Your Ammo gets recharged by unequipping your weapon for every 2.5 seconds. 
  • For exploring the area use Left and Right Arrow in the keyboard for necessary Movement. And for Jumping use Up arrow.
  • There are Lava in certain areas of the game. Do no jump in the water you will Die instantly.

THE GOAL OF THE PLAYER IS TO SAVE HIS WIFE FROM THE ALIENS AND THIER KING.HE HAS TO COMPLETE ALL THE LEVELS TO SAVE HIS WIFE

Developed By
  1. Anirban Chakraborty
  2. Raghuvansh Agarwal
  3. Nihal Ramesh
  4. Arjun M
